prompts: Create a robust-looking Pokemon with a rocky exterior and a strong defensive stance.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a fortress with spikes and a sturdy build.
Imagine a creature that has a slate-gray color with yellow accents and a tough appearance.
Design a Pokemon that can withstand heavy attacks and has a unique dual-type.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both ancient power and modern design elements.
Give me a Pokemon that has a defensive combat style and can protect its allies.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats and has a rocky aesthetic.
